NL System Query: Hey, can you show me how to play Quarto?

NL System Query: Could you give me a win condition?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Switch to this board, does the hollowness of the pieces make it a win?
Switch to this board, can I add one more piece on the second row, the second column?
User Response: No, that will break the win.

Can the other player undo this win?

User Response: Nope. They are not in the same shape obviously.

NL System Query: Switch to this board, can I rotate the pieces by some degrees?
User Response: Yes, you can rotate them by ninety degrees.
